DD_Attribute_Full.name: spacecraft_orientation
DD_Attribute_Full.definition: The spacecraft orientation element provides the orientation of a spacecraft in orbit or cruise in respect to a given frame, (e.g. a non-spinning spacecraft might be flown in +Y or -Y direction in respect to the spacecraft mechanical build frame). This element shall be used in combination with the keyword spacecraft_orientation_desc that describes the convention used to describe the spacecraft orientation. The spacecraft orientation shall be given as a 3-tuple, one value for the x, y and z axes
